attributes.action: bring the Tube to Roehampton, London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Roehampton in south west London has one of the largest housing estates, most people living here are not well off. The area needs regeneration. The most effective way of doing that would be to extend either the Hamersmith or District line tube to Roehampton. As this would bring in new business, create employment and regenerate the area.

rejection.details: Transport for London has jurisdiction over this issue
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
